venue.name: Online Flex Meetup Group Connect Room

item.description:
Presentation Description:

This presentation is an introductory presentation to the Swiz Famework.


Presenters Bio:

Ben Clinkinbeard is a Flex Developer and Technical Architect for Universal Mind. He is also a Principal Architect for the Swiz framework, a lightweight IoC container and utility library for ActionScript 3 and Adobe Flex. Previously, he co-created the FlexMDI library, which was subsequently integrated into FlexLib.

 

As a Digital Design major, Ben earned a B.S. from the University of Cincinnati’s College of Design, Architecture, Art and Planning. He’s been a web developer since 2002, with a focus on the Adobe Flash Platform and a passion for creating engaging software loved by those who use it. His design background and self-taught technical skills give him a unique perspective that makes RIA development a perfect fit.


Join At:

You can join in at http://experts.na3.acrobat.com/ofmg/


Time Check:

Check what time this occurs in your time zone at:
http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?hour=18&min=0&sec=0&p1=98

Logging In:

When you login to the Connect room (the link above)
to view the meeting, PLEASE USE THE "LOGIN AS GUEST" option, and USE YOUR NAME, but do NOT attempt to use your meetup.com username/password or any Connect account. Just sign in as a guest.
item.name: Swiz: Introduction, Overview and Why It's the Best.
